name: Night of Treats
description:
Run around town collecting Treats from houses with their light on. The more treats you carry, the slower you move, and the more you attract the monsters waiting in the dark to feed on your precious, precious treats. 

Walking over uneven ground with a full load will cause you to drop treats, and the monsters try to push you around to knock loose your precious cargo. Defeat the monsters by shining your torch on their weak knees to knock them over. 

Get them back to the cauldron in the graveyard to add to your haul for the night, and gain upgrades.

WASD to move, left shift to run, E to interact, mouse to look and left click to shine your torch.

You start off too weak to defeat the monsters, get some upgrades to get strong enough to knock them down.

Made for Ludum Dare 49

Soundtrack composed by AIVA (Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist): https://www.aiva.ai

Modelling done in blender
